turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order Dominos pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, how many pizzas do you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want the first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What toppings do you want on the first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Feta cheese and pepperoni

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so the first pizza is a large with feta and pepperoni?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok a medium pizza with what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Onions and peppers on half

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so a medium pizza with onions on half?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No a medium pizza with onions and peppers on half

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, a medium pizza with onions and peppers on half?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and what size for the third pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Another large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what toppings on the large pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want ham and pineapple

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok a large pizza with ham and pineapple?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When do you want it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As soon as possible

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it delivered to your home address?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, order completed. It will arrive as soon as possible.
